    • Method Detail

      • cookie

        Directive<scala.Tuple1<HttpCookiePair>> cookie​(java.lang.String name)
        Extracts the HttpCookiePair with the given name. If the cookie is not present the request is rejected with a respective MissingCookieRejection.

        Parameters:
        name - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • optionalCookie

        Directive<scala.Tuple1<scala.Option<HttpCookiePair>>> optionalCookie​(java.lang.String name)
        Extracts the HttpCookiePair with the given name as an Option[HttpCookiePair]. If the cookie is not present a value of None is extracted.

        Parameters:
        name - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • findCookie

        scala.Function1<HttpHeader,​scala.Option<HttpCookiePair>> findCookie​(java.lang.String name)
